title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: VR Systems Based on Ecological Dynamics for Athletes

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of sports pedagogy, understanding of ecological dynamics theory, and experience in VR technology application
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Developing athlete-customized training programs by integrating ecological dynamics theory with VR system design
Designing at least three practical scenarios that facilitate situational cognition-judgment-action processes in VR-based environments
Comparing and selecting VR training modules implementable in limited technical environments (smartphones) according to evaluation criteria

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
